players.name: Michael Jordan
players.Achievements: 5x MVP, 9x All-Defensive 1st Team, Rookie of the Year, 6x Finals MVP, 3x All-Star MVP, All-NBA 2nd Team, 10x All-NBA 1st Team, Defensive Player of the Year, All-Rookie 1st Team

players.name: Lebron James
players.Teams: 2003-10, 2014-18 Cleveland Cavaliers; 2010-14 Miami Heat; 2018-20 Los Angeles Lakers

players.name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

players.name: Bill Russell

players.name: Magic Johnson

players.name: Wilt Chamberlain

players.name: Larry Bird

players.name: Tim Duncan

players.name: Kobe Bryant

players.name: Shaquille O'Neal
